summary: Fixes all seams in Skyrim when using high quality textures by restore land texture to the vanilla land texture.
descriptionHtml:
Skyrim's landscape and Solstheim landscape when using vanilla texture or using high quality textures mods may include seams. Now to fix this issue we can just retexture all of Skyrim and Solstheim which is a pain and will take a long time or just use the vanilla texture where you could not see the seams. Or if you wanted to keep the vanilla landscape textures while having high quality textures for everything else in your game this will do the trick. I know it is not going ahead in graphics since your stuck with vanilla land textures but the rest of the world like the rocks, trees, buildings, items can still be high quality textures. And it does not look bad after all. With grass it looks even better since you cannot see some of the ground.

Read this below on what you will need to download depending on what results you want to see.

-Skyrim 2011 vanilla landscape textures
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011)

-Skyrim 2011 vanilla landscape textures with the High Resolution Texture Pack DLC landscape textures
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 High Resolution Texture Pack DLC)

-Skyrim 2011 and Dawnguard DLC vanilla landscape textures
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dawnguard DLC)

-Skyrim 2011 and Dawnguard DLC vanilla landscape textures with the High Resolution Texture Pack DLC landscape textures
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 High Resolution Texture Pack DLC)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dawnguard DLC)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dawnguard DLC High Resolution Texture Pack DLC)

-Skyrim 2011 and Dragonborn DLC vanilla landscape textures
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dragonborn DLC)

-Skyrim 2011 and Dragonborn DLC vanilla landscape textures with the High Resolution Texture Pack DLC landscape textures
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 High Resolution Texture Pack DLC)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dragonborn DLC)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dragonborn DLC High Resolution Texture Pack DLC)

-Skyrim 2011, Dawnguard DLC and Dragonborn DLC vanilla landscape textures
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dawnguard DLC)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dragonborn DLC)

-Skyrim 2011, Dawnguard DLC and Dragonborn DLC vanilla landscape textures with the High Resolution Texture Pack DLC landscape textures
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 High Resolution Texture Pack DLC)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dawnguard DLC)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dawnguard DLC High Resolution Texture Pack DLC)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dragonborn DLC)
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim 2011 Dragonborn DLC High Resolution Texture Pack DLC)

-Skyrim Special Edition vanilla landscape textures
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim Special Edition)

-Skyrim Special Edition vanilla landscape textures with Dawnguard DLC
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim Special Edition Dawnguard DLC)

-Skyrim Special Edition vanilla landscape textures with DragonbornDLC
Land Texture Fix (Skyrim Special Edition Dragonborn DLC)


If you want the Skyrim Special Edition version go [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/1017/?]here[/url]. Also if you have Oblivion check out my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/46988?]Oblivion Land Texture Fix[/url].



Requirements
Skyrim 2011
High Resolution Texture Pack DLC (Only If you want to use the textures from this texture pack)
Dawnguard DLC (Land Texture Fix (Dawnguard DLC))
Dragonborn DLC (Land Texture Fix (Dragonborn DLC))
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/247/?]BSAOpt[/url] (Only if you want to use the textures from Skyrim 2011)
Skyrim Special Edition (Only if you want to use the textures from Skyrim Special Edition)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/913/?]QuickBsaExtractor[/url] (Only if you want to use the textures from Skyrim Special Edition)

Installing
To install just download then extract folder and drag plugin into your Data folder. Then install [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/247/?]BSAOpt[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/913/?]QuickBsaExtractor[/url] and open the Setup text document and follow the instructions. It can be a pain to install since it is illegal for me to upload vanilla textures from Skyrim. And make sure that this plug-in always loads last on load order list.
author: LegoManIAm94
